custom_50256 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.strong: Hamburg School District is committed to providing a safe environment with equal opportunities for all students to become college/career ready life-long learners.

span.span:
“Building life-long learners,
one student at a time”

div.class: custom_103901 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.span: Because of the Covid-19 virus, Hamburg Pre-K will be unable to have our open registration that was scheduled for April 17, 2020.
If you would like for your child to attend our program, please fill out the online application at
, and we will contact you concerning other needed information.

div.class: custom_84052 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.strong: Come be a part of the PRIDE!
span.br: If you would like your student to attend

br.span:
School Choice Forms should be returned to
Central Office, 202 E Parker and to the resident district by May 1.

Forms may be found on this website under “Parents”
For more info call 870.853.9851

div.class: custom_84418 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
custom_98388 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.span: Does your Child need immunizations or a flu shot?
Does your Child need a physical or a wellness exam?
Don’t forget HSD has a Mainline Clinic on EVERY campus to serve our students for these needs and MORE!
You are welcome to be with your child, but it is not required.
